titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn, Queens, and Long Island Real Estate Brochure collection ARC.296
titlestmt.author: John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:53:29 +0000.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn, Queens, and Long Island real estate brochure collection

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Brooklyn Historical Society (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

physdesc.extent: in nine record cartons and one oversized box

did.abstract: This collection primarily features advertisements for real estate in Brooklyn, Queens, and Long Island. In addition to advertisements, the collection includes a number of blueprint maps. The collection is organized by region and neighborhood. A hard copy index is available with exact street addresses of the buildings included in the collection, along with an additional index of architects found in the collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright of each item varies based on publication date. See library staff for more details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn, Queens, and Long Island Real Estate Brochure collection, ARC.296, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This is an artificial collection which was assembled by BHS Library & Archives staff.
